div.style: display: block; width: 500px; padding: 20px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 340px;
display: block; width: 500px; padding: 20px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 340px;

option.t-att-selected: stock_location['id'] ? ((widget.pos.config.stock_location_id and stock_location.id === widget.pos.config.stock_location_id[0]) ? true : undefined) : undefined

select.option: Cancel: create credit note and reconcile
Modify: create credit note, reconcile and create a new draft invoice

option.t-att-selected: pricelist['id'] ? ((widget.options.pricelist and pricelist.id === widget.options.pricelist['id']) ? true : undefined) : undefined
widget.client['property_payment_term_id'] ? ((widget.client['property_payment_term_id'] and widget.client['property_payment_term_id'][0] === term.id) ? true : undefined) : undefined

div.style: display: block; width: 500px; padding: 20px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 340px;
display: block; width: 900px; padding: 10px; background: ivory; min-height: 600px;

span.class: swal2-confirm btn btn-success button confirm add-prop-notes

span.t-attf-class: btn btn-info note prop-option #{ prop_note.default_line[0] === note.id ? 'selected' : '' }

t.t:
with price: with qty:
Up
Down
